page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: When dinner time came, I went to wash my hands. We sat down to wait for the other children. We all had our dinner. After dinner we went out to play. My brothers and sister go to town to get their dinner. In the afternoon we practiced for{sports {day.}When we had finished sports, we had to play, then we did some work. Then came time to go home. My mum collected Debbie and I. We waited for Derek, Stephen and Esther. We all went home together. After a time we were playing out in the garden. Derek and Stephen were play fighting, I was{flying the kite}I made and Debbie was with the dog. Derek noticed that Auntie Dosh and Uncle Joe and our cousins had come. We did not know how they knew where we lived.
